entry.summary: ...STRONG WINDS AND HEAVY RAIN EXPECTED FOR PORTIONS OF SE ALASKA FOR THE MIDDLE OF THE WEEK... A hurricane force low pressure system will move into the SW Gulf of Alaska Tuesday.
